Quality Education.reason: Course provides foundational tax knowledge for students → relevant to Quality Education.
evidence: 提供學生基本的租稅知識及應用練習
作為學生未來進一步研究及應用的基礎

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Course discusses tax planning for individuals and businesses → relevant to Decent Work and Economic Growth.
evidence: 個人及企業租稅規劃變得更具挑戰性
了解所得稅、遺產及贈與稅與營業稅等國內稅稅法內容

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Course covers tax law principles → relevant to Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.
evidence: 了解稅法的基本概念、稅法之意義及原則

No Poverty.reason: Tax systems are a primary government tool for funding social programs to alleviate poverty. The course's mention of 'social responsibility' provides an inferred link.

Quality Education.reason: The course itself is a form of higher education, aiming to provide students with 'professional accounting knowledge in their field,' contributing to quality professional education.
evidence: 奠定會計專業知識與能力 (Students will gain professional accounting knowledge in their field. )

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course is central to understanding the tax framework for 'economic activities of individuals or enterprises,' which is fundamental to business operations and economic growth.
evidence: 不管是個人或企業的經濟活動皆與稅務密不可分 (the economic activities of individuals or enterprises are inseparable from taxation)
營利事業所得稅 (corporate income tax)

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Tax law is a critical component of the institutional infrastructure that governs industry. The course covers 'corporate income tax' and 'international tax reform wave'.
evidence: 營利事業所得稅 (corporate income tax)
國際間掀起的租稅改革浪潮 (international tax reform wave)

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course covers 'personal comprehensive income tax' and 'inheritance and gift tax,' which are key fiscal instruments used by governments to address wealth and income inequality.
evidence: 個人綜合所得稅 (personal comprehensive income tax)
遺產及贈與稅 (inheritance and gift tax)

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: A core competency is for students to 'understand and be able to identify ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability issues,' linking tax practice to responsible business conduct.
evidence: 理解與辨別道德、社會責任與永續議題的能力 (Students will understand and be able to identify ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability issues.)

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course is fundamentally about 'Tax Law and Regulations,' which are a cornerstone of strong, just, and accountable government institutions.
evidence: 科目名稱：稅務法規 (Course Name: Tax Law and Regulations)
了解稅法的基本概念、稅法之意義及原則 (understand the basic concepts of tax law, its meaning and principles.)

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course addresses the 'international tax reform wave' and 'domestic and foreign tax reform related issues,' which inherently involve international cooperation and partnerships.
evidence: 國際間掀起的租稅改革浪潮 (international tax reform wave)
國內外稅改相關議題介紹 (introduction to domestic and foreign tax reform related issues)
